contentrichtext.text: '''Zygmunt Szweykowski''' ([[Krośniewice]], 7 April 1894 – 11 February 1978, [[Poznań]]) was a historian of [[Polish literature]] who specialized in 19th-century Polish [[prose]]. ==Life== In 1932-39, Szweykowski held a [[professor]]ship at the Free Polish University (''Wolna Wszechnica Polska'') in [[Warsaw]] and [[Łódź]].<ref name="Szweykowski, Zygmunt p. 370">"Szweykowski, Zygmunt," ''Encyklopedia powszechna PWN'' (PWN Universal Encyclopedia), vol. 4, p. 370.</ref> During the [[World War II]] [[Nazism|Nazi]] occupation of [[Poland]], he participated, at the risk of his life, in [[Underground Education in Poland During World War II|underground university]] teaching in Warsaw.<ref name="Szweykowski, Zygmunt p. 370" /> From 1946 he held a chair at [[Poznan University|Poznań University]]. In 1950 he was inducted into the [[Polish Academy of Learning]], and in 1951 into the [[Polish Academy of Sciences]].<ref name="Szweykowski, Zygmunt p. 370" /> Szweykowski studied the 19th-century [[Poland|Polish]] [[novel]]. His books in this field included ''Powieści historyczne Henryka Rzewuskiego'' (The Historical Novels of [[Henryk Rzewuski]], 1922) and ''Trylogia Sienkiewicza'' ([[Henryk Sienkiewicz|Sienkiewicz's]] ''[[The Trilogy|Trilogy]]'', 1961).<ref name="Szweykowski, Zygmunt p. 370" /> His specialty, however, was the writings of [[Bolesław Prus]]. His books on Prus include ''Tworczość Bolesława Prusa'' (The Art of Bolesław Prus, 1947; 2nd ed., 1972) and ''Nie tylko o Prusie: szkice'' (Not Only about Prus: Sketches, 1967).<ref name="Szweykowski, Zygmunt p. 370" /> Beginning in 1948, Szweykowski produced monumental editions of Prus' collected ''Pisma'' (Writings).<ref name="Szweykowski, Zygmunt p. 370" /> He also edited Krystyna Tokarzówna's and Stanisław Fita's exhaustive ''Bolesław Prus, 1847-1912: Kalendarz życia i twórczości'' (Bolesław Prus, 1847-1912: a Calendar of [His] Life and Work), Warsaw, Państwowy Instytut Wydawniczy, 1969. ==Works== * ''Powieści historyczne Henryka Rzewuskiego'' (The [[Historical Novel]]s of [[Henryk Rzewuski]], 1922) * ''"Lalka" Bolesława Prusa'' ([[Bolesław Prus]]' ''[[The Doll (novel)|The Doll]]'', 1927) * ''Twórczość [[Bolesław Prus|Bolesława Prusa]]'' (1947, 1972) * ''"Trylogia" Henryka Sienkiewicza. Szkice'' ([[Henryk Sienkiewicz]]'s ''[[The Trilogy|Trilogy]]'': Sketches, 1961) * ''Nie tylko o Prusie'' (Not Only about [[Bolesław Prus|Prus]], 1967) * ''"Trylogia" Sienkiewicza i inne szkice o twórczości pisarza'' ([[Henryk Sienkiewicz|Sienkiewicz]]'s ''[[The Trilogy|Trilogy]]'' and Other Sketches about the Writer's Works, 1973) ==See also== *[[List of Poles#History|List of Poles]] ==Notes== {{reflist|2}} ==References== *"Szweykowski, Zygmunt," ''Encyklopedia powszechna PWN'' (PWN Universal Encyclopedia), vol. 4, Warsaw, [[Państwowe Wydawnictwo Naukowe]], 1976, p. 370. {{Authority control|VIAF=3806280}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Szweykowski, Zygmunt | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = POlish historian | DATE OF BIRTH = 7 April 1894 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 11 February 1978 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Szweykowski, Zygmunt}} [[Category:Polish historians]] [[Category:Polish writers]] [[Category:1894 births]] [[Category:1978 deaths]]
